SEARCH
Module PSP24
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Deck extends Object implements Serializable
The `Deck` class represents a deck of playable cards. It initializes and manages cards based on different types (GoldCard, ResourceCard, InitialCard) read from JSON files.
See Also:

    • initializeDeck

      public void initializeDeck(CardType cardType) throws FileReadException, FileNotFoundException
      Initializes the deck of cards (arrayList of PlayableCards) of the specified type. Reads the JSON files of the specified Card Type containing the front and back cards, and populates the frontCards and backCards lists with the read cards.
      Parameters:
      cardType - the type of cards to initialize the deck
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if any of the JSON files are not found.
      FileReadException - if there is an error while reading the files.

    • checkEndDeck

      public boolean checkEndDeck()
      Checks if the deck has ended (no more cards available).
      Returns:
      `true` if the deck has ended, `false` otherwise.

    • returnCard

      public PlayableCard[] returnCard() throws DeckEmptyException
      Returns two cards from the deck at a random position (position = CardID). Decreases the numCards attribute of the deck. Removes the cards from the arrays
      Returns:
      an array containing two cards (one front and one back) drawn from the deck
      Throws:
      DeckEmptyException
